page.title: 11LIVING IN IVER HEATH
page.content: My name is Sophie Lambert,I have been living in Iver Heath for just over one year.I used to live in Uxbridge,about 5 minutes walk to the town,but as there are not many shops in Iver Heath at first I missed them,but now I'm getting used to it. In Iver Heath there are a lot of acres of just grassland,so maybe in 20 years the grassland will be made into a town. Traffic comes thundering through Iver Heath to get to the Denham roundabout. Most days of the week there are traffic jams,but soon it won't be so noisy,as at the moment we are waiting for the M25 to be built. It was scheduled to be opened in July,but I think most probably it won't be opened until September. By Sophie Lambert, Aged 11
